name: Ubox
0:
”Alexa, show me the front door”
”Alexa, stop”
”Alexa, talk to front door”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With UBIA doorbell, you can stay connected with what you are in anywhere and any time, access your UBIA doorbell using voice command. Free your hands and enjoy your smart life !

How to get skill?
1. Install your mobile app name is Ubox and login in it, search all device of doorbell. so you can working on the mobile app.
2. From Alexa app, find and enable UBIA Doorbell skill, login with your mobile app account.
3. Tap DISCOVER DEVICES in Alexa app to discover your UBIA doorbell.
4. Setting for doorbell in Alexa app: open Doorbell Press, open unlock by app and setting unlock password, open unlock by voice.

After linking your Ubox account and discover your device in your Alexa account, you can start control doorbell to your echo show with voice command like:
"Alexa, show me the doorbell 3"

if you want stop the UBIA doorbell from the video, you can say:
"Alexa, stop"

if you want open lock from UBIA doorbell, you can say:
Alexa, unlock doorbell 3
Alexa will ask you what is your voice code
we can say:"1234", the "1234" is default setting voice code.
the alexa will say:" door open" 

Compatible Amazon Alexa device
* Echo Show
* Echo spot
* Echo Show 2nd gen

Important Notes:
the doorbell support two way talk from Alexa to doorbell.
when you use this skill, you need to specify the name of your doorbell.

more information you can visit http://us.ubianet.com/
if you have any questions for our skill, please contact our support: http://us.ubianet.com#contact


The domain names of http://us.ubianet.com/ and http://ubox.ubianet.com are both registered domain names of UBIA Technologies Co. ltd. We have corresponding registered domain name certificates.
If required, please provide an email address so that we can upload the domain name certificate file.
